context_of_use: This use case allows customers to browse product listings by category and other criteria to discover items.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to find items more easily
description: Allows customers to browse product listings by category and other criteria to discover items.
preconditions: Customer is logged into the system.
postconditions: Customer can view a list of products by category.
assumptions: The customer has an active account to log in.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to browse products by category.
main_flow: 1. Customer selects a product category → System displays a list of products in that category.
2. Customer scrolls through the product listings → System updates the display with the selected products.
